> "We have to up load all the pod"said The blind Predacon"All the medicals in
> the ark must be contacted and warned"

Legacy leaped off Tuscon's cab to help Talon and Perceptor to load up
Rodimus, his large bulk making the job of carrying Rodimus and the
cocoon like apparatus around him easier to carry.

He carefully lifted him into his arms as he looked about, his single
optic seeming to take in more then just what was obvious visually.

Meanwhile at the caves, the red, yellow and orange colored insectile
creatures began to buzz as their wings began to move rapidly in the
air. They weren't flying, but it was as if they were about to. Several
of them seemed to just now be becoming aware of Tuscon and his party
as the queen herself settled back on the center spire of the room to
watch her babies prepare themselves for something. Meanwhile more baby
insectile creatures were emerging from still other caves.

"We need to leave." Legacy said simply as he turned to enter Tuscon's
cab carrying Rodimus and the trailing strands with him.

(TAG)

Preston
